text: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us, as well as data we gather automatically through the use of our website.
This privacy notice for ZippyPlan explains how and why we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our service.
We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us, as well as data we gather automatically through the use of our website.

We collect various types of information, including: Usage Data: Provides insights on how you use our website, products, and services, including navigation paths, time spent on pages, and pages visited.
Subscription Handling: We use your payment details to manage charges, present billing history, and conduct internal financial reviews.

We collect various types of information, including: Technical Data: This encompasses your internet protocol (IP) address, login credentials, type and version of your browser, as well as your time zone setting and geographic location.
Additionally, as you use our services, we automatically collect certain technical data about your device and usage.
